sentence.Network_en: He could effect cross - fertilization between them.
sentence.Network_cn: 他可以实现它们间的杂交授粉.

sentence.Network_en: Most megadrile earthworms reproduce by normal cross - fertilization.
sentence.Network_cn: 大多数巨蚓的生殖是正常异体受精.

sentence.Network_en: Theory and experiment in physics have developed side by side through mutual cross - fertilization.
sentence.Network_cn: 物理学的理论与实验,相互促进而并肩发展.

PerfectNetExp.abs: ...成其实验材料时，因花的结构，可以以人为的操作完成杂交的授粉(cross-fertilization)工作，而不需担心非计画性授粉的发生；又因 …
...价值、文化多样性的价值，无论是一种文化自身还是多种文化交汇（cross-fertilization）。
...的再造，不以传统所界定的研发技术为限，反而有许多「跨领域效应」（cross-fertilization），以形成差异化竞争的空间。
cross-fertilization 异花受粉, cross-fertilization 异花授精, cross-fertilization 异花受精

list.abs: Maratha的意思中文翻译 ... cross-eyed 斜视的, 对视眼的 cross-fertilize 异花受精, 杂交 cross-garnet T字形铰链.
涡虫虽为雌雄同体,但需要交配进行异体受精(cross fertilization)。 7.再生涡虫的再生能力很强,若将它横切为两段,每一段都会将失去的那一半再生长出来,成为一条.
...cross complement fixation test 交叉补体结合试验cross fertilization 异体受精，异花受精cross hybridization 交叉杂交[不完全配对的序列相互退火].

means.word_mean: 1. fertilization by the union of male and female gametes from different individual of the same species
2. interchange between different cultures or different ways of thinking that is mutually productive and beneficial;

sentences.sentence: "the cross-fertilization of science and the creative arts"
